title: A comparison of artificial intelligence-enhanced electrocardiography approaches for prediction of time-to-mortality using electrocardiogram images
details: A Sau, B Zeidaabadi, K Patlatzoglou, L Pastika… - European Heart Journal …, 2024
abstract: Background Most artificial intelligence-enhanced ECG (AI-ECG) models used to predict adverse events including death require that the ECGs be stored digitally. However, the majority of clinical facilities worldwide store ECGs as images. Methods …
